pageContext.claim: “If we did what we had to do, you would bring crime down in half in our country, because so much of it comes through our southern border.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's statement that a border wall would cut the nation's crime rate in half is simply laughable. There is no evidence to suggest that is the case. Most undocumented immigrants do not cross the southern border and undocumented immigrants do not commit crimes at a rate higher than U.S. citizens.
